title: eDutturaippAi
sahitya:
eDutturappAi hanumAnE en nilaiyai rAmaniDam


anupallavi

  aDuttu vanda enakkirangi AtkoLLavE dAsharathikku nI


caraNam    anru sugrIvanukkaruL pera aiyanaDi paNIndAyE annai nilai
 arind-AriyaniDameDutturaittAyE aNDina vibhISaNark-kabhayam
 tarap-parinduraittAyE inrenai Adari mannanaik-kaNNura Engit-tavikkirEn daNDaniTTEn dayai shei
